text:
One recruiter is looking for the perfect candidate to review its sugary treats - with "honest feedback" (Photo: Getty Images) Share Get money updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Holding out for your dream job? Well today could be the day you finally get lucky, as the world's leading maker of biscuits is currently hiring for a professional chocolate taster - and you've got all the skills required. 
Mondelez International, the geniuses behind some of the world's most famous sugary treats - including Cadbury, Milka, Prince and Oreo - have announced a brand new opportunity to join their team as a part-time chocolate taster. 
The firm, which posted the role on LinkedIn, is looking for someone who can taste its delicacies - and deliver honest and objective feedback within its team of skilled panelists. 
The successful candidate will then help Mondelez perfect and launch brand new products all over the world for years to come. Read More 
Your key responsibilities will include: 
Being able to taste chocolate and cocoa beverage products and give objective and honest feedback. 
Work within a team of panellists to share opinions and collaborate to reach an agreement on taste. 
Use clearly defined vocabulary to describe products and aid in the discrimination between products. 
Be consistent in the results given. 
Know the ethical and legal compliance responsibilities of the position; raise questions and concerns when faced with an ethical or compliance issue; apply integrity in all aspects of professional conduct. poll loading Would you like to work as a chocolate taster? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
